title: Inside eBay’s Turnaround Strategy
sub_head: CEO Jamie Iannone says the company is better positioned to withstand changing consumer habits—and rising inflation
body:
Jamie Iannone became chief executive of eBay Inc. during a tumultuous time for the company.
It was April 2020, the uncertain early days of the pandemic, and the company was facing pressure from activist investors calling for the company to speed up a sale of big assets and appoint a new CEO.
